query:
ALTER TABLE users 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS emailProvider ENUM('smtp', 'gmail_oauth', 'outlook_oauth') DEFAULT 'smtp' AFTER smtpFromName,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS oauth2AccessToken TEXT AFTER emailProvider,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS oauth2RefreshToken TEXT AFTER oauth2AccessToken,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS oauth2TokenExpiry TIMESTAMP NULL AFTER oauth2RefreshToken,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS oauth2Email VARCHAR(320) AFTER oauth2TokenExpiry;
